ISSUE.TITLE: Breadcrumb link error?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### Triage priority N/A ### NetBox Version v4.1.6 ### Python Version 3.12 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Navigate to one specific module type, e.g.: .../dcim/module-types/9/ 2. Click on the Manufacturer's name in the breadcrumb path at the top of the view **'Module Type> [Manufacturer]'** ### Expected Behavior **module-type** list (.../dcim/module-types/?manufacturer_id=9) ### Observed Behavior **device-type** list (.../dcim/device-types/?manufacturer_id=9)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18308 from netbox-community/feature Prep for v4.2.0 release
